content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function given by <math alttext="f of x, equals, sine x, plus e raised to the negative x power, plus 3 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true for <math alttext="y equals, f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y double prime, equals, sine x, plus e raised to the negative x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the third derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, the derivative of y, with respect to x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fourth derivative of f of x, equals, f prime of x, times f triple prime of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>‴</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y minus the fourth derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, 3 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y minus the fourth derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, 3 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
